Learn how to add and validate your envir: Learn how to add and validate your environment variables in your application.
MBC CQRS serverless framework comes with: MBC CQRS serverless framework comes with built-in support for environment variables, which allows you to do the following:
MBC CQRS serverless framework has built-: MBC CQRS serverless framework has built-in support for loading environment variables from `.env*` files into `process.env.`
It is standard practice to throw an exce: It is standard practice to throw an exception during application startup if required environment variables haven't been provided or if they don't meet certain validation rules. The `@mbc-cqrs-serverless/core` package makes this easy to do.
With this in place, you pass the `EnvVal: With this in place, you pass the `EnvValidation` class as a configuration argument of the `createHandler` function, as follows:
